name: Habits+
description: A simple, effective and automated Habit template to help you start tracking the things that matter and make progress towards your goals. What's included in the template:✔️ Habit tracker automatically resets and tracks progress each day✔️ Statistics page to track progress over the week, month and year✔️ Beginner friendly! Two versions of the template, one simple and one advanced. Caters to all Notion users!FAQDoes this work with a free Notion account?Sure does! Just hit duplicate and you're good
